title: Dessert Haiku: Petite Desserts for the Sweet Tooth & Poetry for the Soul
description: Dessert Haiku stimulates your exotic sweet tooth while feeding the mind. The cornerstone to making first-rate desserts is using fresh ingredients to create real food made simply. Welcome Dessert Haiku into your food and poetry love life. Deliver a taste sensation of sweetness while uncovering dozens of fresh dessert recipes from around the world. Gratify a bland uninteresting food life with Dessert Haiku. Embrace the sweetness in life. The influence of international dessert fare pooled with a fresh outlook on food and poetry makes for a one of a kind cookbook. Each recipe also has an intimate serving size. Exploring desserts from all over the world and pairing them with delectable inexpensive wines, let us journey on a one-of-a-kind poetic dessert expedition.
author: Ivy Newton-Gamble
